name: reseller
title: Enterprise Apps Reseller API
description: Lets you create and manage your customers and their subscriptions.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

Address.description: JSON template for address of a customer.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a customer address.

locality.description: Name of the locality. This is in accordance with - http://portablecontacts.net/draft-spec.html#address_element.

postalCode.description: The postal code. This is in accordance with - http://portablecontacts.net/draft-spec.html#address_element.

region.description: Name of the region. This is in accordance with - http://portablecontacts.net/draft-spec.html#address_element.

ChangePlanRequest.description: JSON template for the ChangePlan rpc request.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a subscription change plan request.

planName.description: Name of the plan to change to.

purchaseOrderId.description: Purchase order id for your order tracking purposes.

seats.description: Number/Limit of seats in the new plan.

alternateEmail.description: The alternate email of the customer.

customerDomain.description: The domain name of the customer.

customerDomainVerified.description: Whether the customer's primary domain has been verified.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a customer.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer.

postalAddress.description: The postal address of the customer.

RenewalSettings.description: JSON template for a subscription renewal settings.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a subscription renewal setting.
Identifies the resource as a subscription change plan request.

licensedNumberOfSeats.description: Read-only field containing the current number of licensed seats for FLEXIBLE Google-Apps subscriptions and secondary subscriptions such as Google-Vault and Drive-storage.

maximumNumberOfSeats.description: Maximum number of seats that can be purchased. This needs to be provided only for a non-commitment plan. For a commitment plan it is decided by the contract.

numberOfSeats.description: Number of seats to purchase. This is applicable only for a commitment plan.

creationTime.description: Creation time of this subscription in milliseconds since Unix epoch.

customerId.description: The id of the customer to whom the subscription belongs.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a Subscription.

commitmentInterval.description: Interval of the commitment if it is a commitment plan.

endTime.description: End time of the commitment interval in milliseconds since Unix epoch.

startTime.description: Start time of the commitment interval in milliseconds since Unix epoch.

isCommitmentPlan.description: Whether the plan is a commitment plan or not.

planName.description: The plan name of this subscription's plan.

purchaseOrderId.description: Purchase order id for your order tracking purposes.

seats.description: Number/Limit of seats in the new plan.

skuId.description: Name of the sku for which this subscription is purchased.

suspensionReasons.description:
field listing all current reasons the subscription is suspended. It is possible for a subscription to have multiple suspension reasons. A subscription's status is SUSPENDED until all pending suspensions are removed. Possible options include:  
- PENDING_TOS_ACCEPTANCE — The customer has not logged in and accepted the Google Apps Resold Terms of Services.  
- RENEWAL_WITH_TYPE_CANCEL — The customer's commitment ended and their service was cancelled at the end of their term.  
- RESELLER_INITIATED — A manual suspension invoked by a Reseller.  
- TRIAL_ENDED — The customer's trial expired without a plan selected.  
- OTHER — The customer is suspended for an internal Google reason (e.g. abuse or otherwise).

transferInfo.description: Transfer related information for the subscription.

transferabilityExpirationTime.description: Time when transfer token or intent to transfer will expire.

isInTrial.description: Whether the subscription is in trial.

trialEndTime.description: End time of the trial in milliseconds since Unix epoch.

Subscriptions.description: JSON template for a subscription list.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a collection of subscriptions.

nextPageToken.description: The continuation token, used to page through large result sets. Provide this value in a subsequent request to return the next page of results.

subscriptions.description: The subscriptions in this page of results.

get.description: Gets a customer resource if one exists and is owned by the reseller.

insert.description: Creates a customer resource if one does not already exist.

customerAuthToken.description: An auth token needed for inserting a customer for which domain already exists. Can be generated at https://www.google.com/a/cpanel//TransferToken. Optional.

patch.description: Update a customer resource if one it exists and is owned by the reseller. This method supports patch semantics.

update.description: Update a customer resource if one it exists and is owned by the reseller.

activate.description: Activates a subscription previously suspended by the reseller

subscriptionId.description: Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer

changePlan.description: Changes the plan of a subscription

subscriptionId.description: Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer

changeRenewalSettings.description: Changes the renewal settings of a subscription

subscriptionId.description: Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer

changeSeats.description: Changes the seats configuration of a subscription

subscriptionId.description: Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer

deletionType.description: Whether the subscription is to be fully cancelled or downgraded
enumDescriptions: Downgrades a Google Apps for Business subscription to Google Apps
Suspends the subscriptions for 4 days before cancelling it
Transfers a subscription directly to Google

subscriptionId.description: Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer

get.description: Gets a subscription of the customer.

subscriptionId.description: Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer

insert.description: Creates/Transfers a subscription for the customer.

customerAuthToken.description: An auth token needed for transferring a subscription. Can be generated at https://www.google.com/a/cpanel/customer-domain/TransferToken. Optional.

list.description: Lists subscriptions of a reseller, optionally filtered by a customer name prefix.

customerAuthToken.description: An auth token needed if the customer is not a resold customer of this reseller. Can be generated at https://www.google.com/a/cpanel/customer-domain/TransferToken.Optional.

customerNamePrefix.description: Prefix of the customer's domain name by which the subscriptions should be filtered. Optional

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return

pageToken.description: Token to specify next page in the list

startPaidService.description: Starts paid service of a trial subscription

subscriptionId.description: Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer
Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer
